creation_dashboard.title: Creation Overview
creation_dashboard.description: See how much you've written with AI â€“ stories, words, active days and streaks.

total_stories.title: Total Stories
total_stories.description: Includes all drafts, saved and published stories.

total_words.title: Total Words
total_words.description: Total words generated in your stories, based on story content.

creation_days.title: Creation Days
creation_days.description: Number of calendar days where you created at least one story.

streak.title: Creation Streak
streak.description: Your current streak in days, with a longest streak of {longest_streak} days.

activity.title: Last 30 Days Activity
activity.description: Each square represents a day. Darker color means more stories created.
activity.trend_hint: The bar chart shows your daily word counts over the last 30 days.
activity.empty: No cloud stories in the last 30 days yet. Start by writing your first one!

story_page.create_description: Generate unique, creative stories with AI in seconds. Try different genres, lengths, and styles!

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Stay updated with our latest features and improvements

ai_tools.section_description_home: Discover all AI writing features in one place â€“ from story generation to titles, fanfic, plots and poems.
ai_tools.section_description_hub: Browse all AI writing tools on this site and jump directly into the feature that best matches your writing scenario.

story_generator.name: Story Generator
story_generator.desc: Turn a single idea into a full story in seconds with AI, across multiple genres and languages.

fantasy_generator.name: Fantasy Story Generator
fantasy_generator.desc: Create immersive fantasy stories with AI â€“ epic quests, xianxia, urban fantasy and more.

book_title_generator.name: Book Title Generator
book_title_generator.desc: Generate eye-catching, creative book titles for novels, blogs, and eBooks with AI.

fanfic_generator.name: Fanfic Generator
fanfic_generator.desc: Write fanfiction with AI, including character pairings, canon-friendly plots, and preset works.

plot_generator.name: Plot Generator
plot_generator.desc: Generate detailed story outlines and plot structures to scaffold your writing.

poem_generator.name: Poem Generator
poem_generator.desc: Create poems in modern, classical, or haiku styles with the help of AI.

poem_title_generator.name: Poem Title Generator
poem_title_generator.desc: Generate creative, evocative titles for your poems â€“ literary or viral-ready, in multiple languages.

backstory_generator.name: Backstory Generator
backstory_generator.desc: Create rich, structured character backstories for RPGs, novels, VTubers, and chatbots.

story_prompt_generator.name: Story Prompt Generator
story_prompt_generator.desc: Generate creative story prompts and ideas instantly to defeat writer's block.

dialogue_generator.name: Dialogue Generator
dialogue_generator.desc: Create realistic, engaging character dialogues for screenplays, novels, and games with AI.
